fr.upmc.components.examples.dynamic_cs

Class DynamicDistributedCVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
      • fr.upmc.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
        • fr.upmc.components.examples.dynamic_cs.DynamicDistributedCVM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentVirtualMachineI, DistributedComponentVirtualMachineI

    public class DynamicDistributedCVM
extends AbstractDistributedCVM
    The class DynamicDistributedDynamicCVM creates a component assembly for the multiple-JVM execution of the dynamic connection example.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 14 mars 2014

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
